00039 #define EPSILON (1.0E-10)
00040 
00041 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00042 template <typename num>
00043 inline num sse_sqrt(num xin)
00044 {
00045   __m128d x = _mm_set_sd(double(xin));
00046   __m128d y = _mm_set_sd(double(xin));
00047   x = _mm_sqrt_sd(x,y);
00048   double retVal;
00049   _mm_store_sd(&retVal,x);
00050   return(retVal);
00051 }
00052 
00053 template <> inline float sse_sqrt<float>(float xin)
00054 {
00055   __m128 x = _mm_set_ss((float) xin);
00056   x = _mm_sqrt_ss(x);
00057   float retVal;
00058   _mm_store_ss(&retVal,x);
00059   return(retVal);
00060 }
00061 
00062 template <> inline double sse_sqrt<double>(double xin)
00063 {
00064   __m128d x = _mm_set_sd(xin);
00065   __m128d y = _mm_set_sd(xin);
00066   x = _mm_sqrt_sd(x,y);
00067   double retVal;
00068   _mm_store_sd(&retVal,x);
00069   return(retVal);
00070 }
00071 
00072 template <typename num>
00073 inline num sse_dot_product(const num* fv1, const num* fv2, const int mask)
00074 {
00075   __m128 v1 = _mm_set_ps(float(fv1[3]),float(fv1[2]),float(fv1[1]),float(fv1[0]));
00076   __m128 v2 = _mm_set_ps(float(fv2[3]),float(fv2[2]),float(fv2[1]),float(fv2[0]));
00077   __m128 dp = _mm_dp_ps(v1,v2,mask);
00078   float res;
00079   _mm_store_ss(&res,dp);
00080   return res;
00081 }
00082 
00083 template <>
00084 inline float sse_dot_product(const float* fv1, const float* fv2, const int mask)
00085 {
00086   __m128 v1 = _mm_load_ps(fv1);
00087   __m128 v2 = _mm_load_ps(fv2);
00088   __m128 dp = _mm_dp_ps(v1,v2,mask);
00089   float res;
00090   _mm_store_ss(&res,dp);
00091   return res;
00092 }
00093 
00094 template <>
00095 inline double sse_dot_product(const double* fv1, const double* fv2, const int mask)
00096 {
00097   __m128d v1 = _mm_load_pd(fv1);
00098   __m128d v2 = _mm_load_pd(fv2);
00099   __m128d dp1 = _mm_dp_pd(v1,v2,0x31);
00100   v1 = _mm_load_pd(&fv1[2]);
00101   v2 = _mm_load_pd(&fv2[2]);
00102   __m128d dp2 = _mm_dp_pd(v1,v2,mask);
00103   __m128d dp = _mm_add_sd(dp1,dp2);
00104   double res;
00105   _mm_store_sd(&res,dp);
00106   return res;
00107 }
00108 
00109 #endif
00110 
00111 template <class num> inline num mysqrt(num x)
00112 {
00113 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00114   return sse_sqrt<num>(x);
00115 #else
00116   return sqrt(x);
00117 #endif
00118 }

00120 template <class num> class vector3d;
00121 
00122 template <class num>
00123 class matrix3d{
00124 public:
00125   union {
00126     struct{
00127       num m11;
00128       num m12;
00129       num m13;
00130       num m14;
00131       num m21;
00132       num m22;
00133       num m23;
00134       num m24;
00135       num m31;
00136       num m32;
00137       num m33;
00138       num m34;
00139       num m41;
00140       num m42;
00141       num m43;
00142       num m44;
00143     };
00144     num elements[16];
00145   }__attribute__ ((aligned (16)));
00146   
00147   void setxyzRotations(num rx, num ry, num rz);
00148   void xyzRotationAndTransformation(num rx, num ry, num rz, vector3d<num> t);
00149   matrix3d<num> operator*(const matrix3d< num > &M2) const;
00150   matrix3d<num> transpose() const;
00151 };
00152 
00153 template <class num> void matrix3d<num>::setxyzRotations(num rx, num ry, num rz)
00154 {
00155   double cx = cos(rx);
00156   double sx = sin(rx);
00157   double cy = cos(ry);
00158   double sy = sin(ry);
00159   double cz = cos(rz);
00160   double sz = sin(rz);
00161   
00162   m11 = cz*cy;            m12 = -sz;        m13 = cz*sy;            m14 = 0.0;
00163   m21 = cx*sz*cy+sx*sy;   m22 = cx*cz;      m23 = cx*sz*sy-sx*cy;   m24 = 0.0;
00164   m31 = sx*sz*cy-cx*sy;   m32 = sx*cz;      m33 = cx*cy;            m34 = 0.0;
00165   m41 = 0.0;              m42 = 0.0;        m43 = 0.0;              m44 = 1.0;
00166 }
00167 
00168 template <class num> void matrix3d<num>::xyzRotationAndTransformation(num rx, num ry, num rz, vector3d< num > t)
00169 {
00170   double cx = cos(rx);
00171   double sx = sin(rx);
00172   double cy = cos(ry);
00173   double sy = sin(ry);
00174   double cz = cos(rz);
00175   double sz = sin(rz);
00176   
00177   m11 = cz*cy;            m12 = -sz;        m13 = cz*sy;            m14 = t.x;
00178   m21 = cx*sz*cy+sx*sy;   m22 = cx*cz;      m23 = cx*sz*sy-sx*cy;   m24 = t.y;
00179   m31 = sx*sz*cy-cx*sy;   m32 = sx*cz;      m33 = cx*cy;            m34 = t.z;
00180   m41 = 0.0;              m42 = 0.0;        m43 = 0.0;              m44 = 1.0;
00181 }
00182 
00183 template <class num> matrix3d<num> matrix3d<num>::operator*(const matrix3d< num >& M2) const
00184 {
00185   #define m1(i,j) m ## i ## j
00186   #define m2(i,j) M2.m ## i ## j
00187   #define m3(i,j) M3.m ## i ## j
00188   
00189   matrix3d<num> M3;
00190   
00191   m3(1,1) = m1(1,1)*m2(1,1) + m1(1,2)*m2(2,1) + m1(1,3)*m2(3,1) + m1(1,4)*m2(4,1);
00192   m3(1,2) = m1(1,1)*m2(1,2) + m1(1,2)*m2(2,2) + m1(1,3)*m2(3,2) + m1(1,4)*m2(4,2);
00193   m3(1,3) = m1(1,1)*m2(1,3) + m1(1,2)*m2(2,3) + m1(1,3)*m2(3,3) + m1(1,4)*m2(4,3);
00194   m3(1,4) = m1(1,1)*m2(1,4) + m1(1,2)*m2(2,4) + m1(1,3)*m2(3,4) + m1(1,4)*m2(4,4);
00195   
00196   m3(2,1) = m1(2,1)*m2(1,1) + m1(2,2)*m2(2,1) + m1(2,3)*m2(3,1) + m1(2,4)*m2(4,1);
00197   m3(2,2) = m1(2,1)*m2(1,2) + m1(2,2)*m2(2,2) + m1(2,3)*m2(3,2) + m1(2,4)*m2(4,2);
00198   m3(2,3) = m1(2,1)*m2(1,3) + m1(2,2)*m2(2,3) + m1(2,3)*m2(3,3) + m1(2,4)*m2(4,3);
00199   m3(2,4) = m1(2,1)*m2(1,4) + m1(2,2)*m2(2,4) + m1(2,3)*m2(3,4) + m1(2,4)*m2(4,4);
00200   
00201   m3(3,1) = m1(3,1)*m2(1,1) + m1(3,2)*m2(2,1) + m1(3,3)*m2(3,1) + m1(3,4)*m2(4,1);
00202   m3(3,2) = m1(3,1)*m2(1,2) + m1(3,2)*m2(2,2) + m1(3,3)*m2(3,2) + m1(3,4)*m2(4,2);
00203   m3(3,3) = m1(3,1)*m2(1,3) + m1(3,2)*m2(2,3) + m1(3,3)*m2(3,3) + m1(3,4)*m2(4,3);
00204   m3(3,4) = m1(3,1)*m2(1,4) + m1(3,2)*m2(2,4) + m1(3,3)*m2(3,4) + m1(3,4)*m2(4,4);
00205   
00206   m3(4,1) = m1(4,1)*m2(1,1) + m1(4,2)*m2(2,1) + m1(4,3)*m2(3,1) + m1(4,4)*m2(4,1);
00207   m3(4,2) = m1(4,1)*m2(1,2) + m1(4,2)*m2(2,2) + m1(4,3)*m2(3,2) + m1(4,4)*m2(4,2);
00208   m3(4,3) = m1(4,1)*m2(1,3) + m1(4,2)*m2(2,3) + m1(4,3)*m2(3,3) + m1(4,4)*m2(4,3);
00209   m3(4,4) = m1(4,1)*m2(1,4) + m1(4,2)*m2(2,4) + m1(4,3)*m2(3,4) + m1(4,4)*m2(4,4);
00210   
00211   return M3;
00212 }
00213 
00214 template <class num> matrix3d<num> matrix3d<num>::transpose() const
00215 {
00216   matrix3d<num> M2 = *this;
00217   swap(M2.m12,M2.m21);
00218   swap(M2.m13,M2.m31);
00219   swap(M2.m14,M2.m41);
00220   swap(M2.m23,M2.m32);
00221   swap(M2.m24,M2.m42);
00222   swap(M2.m34,M2.m43);
00223   
00224   return M2;
00225 }
00226 
00227 template <class num>
00228 class vector3d{
00229 public:
00230   union {
00231     struct{
00232       num x;
00233       num y;
00234       num z;
00235       num w;
00236     };
00237     num coefficients[4];
00238   }__attribute__ ((aligned (16)));
00239   //num x,y,z;
00240 
00241   vector3d()
00242     {x=y=z=0.0;w=1.0;}
00243   vector3d(num nx,num ny,num nz)
00244     {x=nx; y=ny; z=nz; w=1.0;}
00245   vector3d(num nx,num ny,num nz,num nw)
00246     {x=nx; y=ny; z=nz; w=nw;}
00247   void set(num nx,num ny,num nz)
00248     {x=nx; y=ny; z=nz; w=1.0;}
00249   void set(num nx,num ny,num nz,num nw)
00250     {x=nx; y=ny; z=nz; w=nw;}
00251   void setAll(num nx)
00252     {x=y=z=nx; w=1.0;}
00253   void set(vector3d<num> p)
00254     {x=p.x; y=p.y; z=p.z; w = p.w;}
00255   void zero()
00256     {x=y=z=0; w=1.0;}
00257 
00258   vector3d<num> &operator=(const vector3d<num> p)
00259     {set(p); return(*this);}
00260 
00262   num &operator[](int idx)
00263     {return(coefficients[idx]);}
00264   const num &operator[](int idx) const
00265     {return(coefficients[idx]);}
00266 
00267   num length() const MustUseResult;
00268   num sqlength() const MustUseResult;
00269   vector3d<num> norm() const MustUseResult;
00270   vector3d<num> norm(const num len) const MustUseResult;
00271   void normalize();
00272   bool nonzero() const MustUseResult
00273     {return(x!=0 || y!=0 || z!=0);}
00274 
00275   num dot(const vector3d<num> p) const MustUseResult;
00276   vector3d<num> cross(const vector3d<num> p) const MustUseResult;
00277 
00278   vector3d<num> &operator+=(const vector3d<num> p);
00279   vector3d<num> &operator-=(const vector3d<num> p);
00280   vector3d<num> &operator*=(const vector3d<num> p);
00281   vector3d<num> &operator/=(const vector3d<num> p);
00282 
00283   vector3d<num> operator+(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00284   vector3d<num> operator-(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00285   vector3d<num> operator*(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00286   vector3d<num> operator/(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00287 
00288   vector3d<num> operator*(num f) const;
00289   vector3d<num> operator/(num f) const;
00290   vector3d<num> &operator*=(num f);
00291   vector3d<num> &operator/=(num f);
00292 
00293   vector3d<num> operator-() const;
00294 
00295   bool operator==(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00296   bool operator!=(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00297   bool operator< (const vector3d<num> p) const;
00298   bool operator> (const vector3d<num> p) const;
00299   bool operator<=(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00300   bool operator>=(const vector3d<num> p) const;
00301 
00302   vector3d<num> rotate(const vector3d<num> r,const double a) const;
00303   vector3d<num> transform(const matrix3d<num> &M) const;
00304   vector3d<num> rotate_x(const double a) const;
00305   vector3d<num> rotate_y(const double a) const;
00306   vector3d<num> rotate_z(const double a) const;
00307 
00308   //double shortest_angle(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b);
00309   //vector3d<num> shortest_axis(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b);
00310 
00311   bool finite() const MustUseResult
00312     {return(::finite(x) && ::finite(y) && ::finite(z));}
00313 
00314   void take_min(const vector3d<num> p);
00315   void take_max(const vector3d<num> p);
00316 };

00318 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00319 template <> float vector3d<float>::sqlength() const;
00320 
00321 template <> float vector3d<float>::dot(const vector3d<float> p) const;
00322 
00323 template <> vector3d<float> vector3d<float>::transform(const matrix3d<float> &M) const;

00325 
00326 VECTOR_TEM num vector3d<num>::length() const
00327 {
00328   return(mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y + z*z));
00329   
00330 }
00331 
00332 VECTOR_TEM num vector3d<num>::sqlength() const
00333 {
00334 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00335   __m128 p = _mm_set_ps((float)x,(float)y,(float)z,0.0f);
00336   p = _mm_mul_ps(p,p);
00337   __attribute__((aligned (16))) float x2[4];
00338   _mm_store_ps(x2,p);
00339   return(x2[3]+x2[2]+x2[1]);
00340 #else
00341   return(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00342 #endif
00343 }
00344 
00345 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::norm() const
00346 {
00347 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00348   vector3d<num> p;
00349   num lInv = 1.0/(this->length());
00350   
00351   p.x = x * lInv;
00352   p.y = y * lInv;
00353   p.z = z * lInv;
00354   
00355   return(p);
00356 #else
00357   vector3d<num> p;
00358   num l;
00359 
00360   l = mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00361   p.x = x / l;
00362   p.y = y / l;
00363   p.z = z / l;
00364 
00365   return(p);
00366 #endif
00367 }
00368 
00369 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::norm(const num len) const
00370 {
00371 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00372   vector3d<num> p;
00373   
00374   __m128 f = _mm_set1_ps(((float)len) / (this->length()));
00375   __m128 pm = _mm_set_ps((float)x,(float)y,(float)z,0.0f);
00376   pm = _mm_mul_ps(pm,f);
00377   __attribute__((aligned (16))) float x2[4];
00378   _mm_store_ps(x2,pm);
00379   p.x = x2[3];
00380   p.y = x2[2];
00381   p.z = x2[1];
00382   
00383   return(p);
00384 #else
00385   vector3d<num> p;
00386   num f;
00387 
00388   f = len / mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00389   p.x = x * f;
00390   p.y = y * f;
00391   p.z = z * f;
00392 
00393   return(p);
00394 #endif
00395 }
00396 
00397 VECTOR_TEM void vector3d<num>::normalize()
00398 {
00399 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00400   __m128 f = _mm_set1_ps(1.0f / (this->length()));
00401   __m128 pm = _mm_set_ps((float)x,(float)y,(float)z,0.0f);
00402   pm = _mm_mul_ps(pm,f);
00403   __attribute__((aligned (16))) float x2[4];
00404   _mm_store_ps(x2,pm);
00405   x = x2[3];
00406   y = x2[2];
00407   z = x2[1];
00408   return;
00409 #else
00410   num l;
00411 
00412   l = mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00413   x /= l;
00414   y /= l;
00415   z /= l;
00416 #endif
00417 }
00418 
00419 VECTOR_TEM num vector3d<num>::dot(const vector3d<num> p) const
00420 {
00421   return(x*p.x + y*p.y + z*p.z);
00422 }
00423 
00424 VECTOR_TEM num dot(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00425 {
00426   return(a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z);
00427 }
00428 
00429 VECTOR_TEM num absdot(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00430 {
00431   return(fabs(a.x*b.x) + fabs(a.y*b.y) + fabs(a.z*b.z));
00432 }
00433 
00434 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::cross(const vector3d<num> p) const
00435 {
00436   vector3d<num> r;
00437 
00438   // right handed
00439   r.x = y*p.z - z*p.y;
00440   r.y = z*p.x - x*p.z;
00441   r.z = x*p.y - y*p.x;
00442 
00443   return(r);
00444 }
00445 
00446 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> cross(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00447 {
00448   vector3d<num> r;
00449 
00450   // right handed
00451   r.x = a.y*b.z - a.z*b.y;
00452   r.y = a.z*b.x - a.x*b.z;
00453   r.z = a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x;
00454 
00455   return(r);
00456 }
00457 
00458 #define VECTOR3D_EQUAL_BINARY_OPERATOR(opr) \
00459   template <class num> \
00460   vector3d<num> &vector3d<num>::operator opr (const vector3d<num> p) \
00461   {                  \
00462     x opr p.x;   \
00463     y opr p.y;   \
00464     z opr p.z;   \
00465     return(*this);   \
00466   }
00467 
00468 VECTOR3D_EQUAL_BINARY_OPERATOR(+=)
00469 VECTOR3D_EQUAL_BINARY_OPERATOR(-=)
00470 VECTOR3D_EQUAL_BINARY_OPERATOR(*=)
00471 VECTOR3D_EQUAL_BINARY_OPERATOR(/=)
00472 
00473 #define VECTOR3D_BINARY_OPERATOR(opr) \
00474   template <class num> \
00475   vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::operator opr (const vector3d<num> p) const \
00476   {                  \
00477     vector3d<num> r; \
00478     r.x = x opr p.x; \
00479     r.y = y opr p.y; \
00480     r.z = z opr p.z; \
00481     return(r);       \
00482   }
00483 
00484 VECTOR3D_BINARY_OPERATOR(+)
00485 VECTOR3D_BINARY_OPERATOR(-)
00486 VECTOR3D_BINARY_OPERATOR(*)
00487 VECTOR3D_BINARY_OPERATOR(/)
00488 
00489 #define VECTOR3D_SCALAR_OPERATOR(opr) \
00490   template <class num> \
00491   vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::operator opr (const num f) const \
00492   {                  \
00493     vector3d<num> r; \
00494     r.x = x opr f;   \
00495     r.y = y opr f;   \
00496     r.z = z opr f;   \
00497     return(r);       \
00498   }
00499 
00500 VECTOR3D_SCALAR_OPERATOR(*)
00501 VECTOR3D_SCALAR_OPERATOR(/)
00502 
00503 #define VECTOR3D_EQUAL_SCALAR_OPERATOR(opr) \
00504   template <class num> \
00505   vector3d<num> &vector3d<num>::operator opr (num f) \
00506   {                \
00507     x opr f;   \
00508     y opr f;   \
00509     z opr f;   \
00510     return(*this); \
00511   }
00512 
00513 VECTOR3D_EQUAL_SCALAR_OPERATOR(*=)
00514 VECTOR3D_EQUAL_SCALAR_OPERATOR(/=)
00515 
00516 #define VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(opr,combine) \
00517   template <class num> \
00518   bool vector3d<num>::operator opr (const vector3d<num> p) const \
00519   {                            \
00520     return((x opr p.x) combine \
00521            (y opr p.y) combine \
00522            (z opr p.z));       \
00523   }
00524 
00525 VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(==,&&)
00526 VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(!=,||)
00527 
00528 VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(< ,&&)
00529 VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(> ,&&)
00530 VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(<=,&&)
00531 VECTOR3D_LOGIC_OPERATOR(>=,&&)
00532 
00533 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::operator-() const
00534 {
00535   vector3d<num> r;
00536 
00537   r.x = -x;
00538   r.y = -y;
00539   r.z = -z;
00540 
00541   return(r);
00542 }
00543 
00544 template<class num1, class num2> vector3d<num2> operator*(num1 f,const vector3d<num2> &a)
00545 {
00546   vector3d<num2> r;
00547 
00548   r.x = f * a.x;
00549   r.y = f * a.y;
00550   r.z = f * a.z;
00551 
00552   return(r);
00553 }

00555 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> abs(vector3d<num> a)
00556 {
00557   a.x = ::fabs(a.x);
00558   a.y = ::fabs(a.y);
00559   a.z = ::fabs(a.z);
00560 
00561   return(a);
00562 }

00564 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> min(vector3d<num> a,vector3d<num> b)
00565 {

00569   v.y = ::min(a.y,b.y);
00570   v.z = ::min(a.z,b.z);
00571 
00572   return(v);

00575 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> max(vector3d<num> a,vector3d<num> b)
00576 {

00579   v.x = ::max(a.x,b.x);
00580   v.y = ::max(a.y,b.y);
00581   v.z = ::max(a.z,b.z);
00582

00586 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> bound(vector3d<num> v,num low,num high)
00587 {
00588   v.x = ::bound(v.x,low,high);
00589   v.y = ::bound(v.y,low,high);
00590   v.z = ::bound(v.z,low,high);
00591 
00592   return(v);
00593 }
00594 
00595 // returns point rotated around axis <r> by <a> radians (right handed)
00596 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::rotate(const vector3d<num> r,const double a) const
00597 {
00598   vector3d<num> q;
00599   double s,c,t;
00600 
00601   s = sin(a);
00602   c = cos(a);
00603   t = 1 - c;
00604 
00605   q.x = (t * r.x * r.x + c      ) * x
00606       + (t * r.x * r.y - s * r.z) * y
00607       + (t * r.x * r.z + s * r.y) * z;
00608 
00609   q.y = (t * r.y * r.x + s * r.z) * x
00610       + (t * r.y * r.y + c      ) * y
00611       + (t * r.y * r.z - s * r.x) * z;
00612 
00613   q.z = (t * r.z * r.x - s * r.y) * x
00614       + (t * r.z * r.y + s * r.x) * y
00615       + (t * r.z * r.z + c      ) * z;
00616 
00617   return(q);
00618 }
00619 
00620 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::transform(const matrix3d< num >& M) const
00621 {
00622   vector3d<num> q;
00623   q.x = M.m11*x + M.m12*y + M.m13*z + M.m14*w;
00624   q.y = M.m21*x + M.m22*y + M.m23*z + M.m24*w;
00625   q.z = M.m31*x + M.m32*y + M.m33*z + M.m34*w;
00626   
00627   return(q);
00628 }
00629 
00630 // returns point rotated around X axis by <a> radians (right handed)
00631 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::rotate_x(const double a) const
00632 {
00633   vector3d<num> q;
00634   double s,c;
00635 
00636   s = sin(a);
00637   c = cos(a);
00638 
00639   q.x = x;
00640   q.y = c*y + -s*z;
00641   q.z = s*y + c*z;
00642 
00643   return(q);
00644 }
00645 
00646 // returns point rotated around Y axis by <a> radians (right handed)
00647 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::rotate_y(const double a) const
00648 {
00649   vector3d<num> q;
00650   double s,c;
00651 
00652   s = sin(a);
00653   c = cos(a);
00654 
00655   q.x = c*x + s*z;
00656   q.y = y;
00657   q.z = -s*x + c*z;
00658 
00659   return(q);
00660 }
00661 
00662 // returns point rotated around Z axis by <a> radians (right handed)
00663 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> vector3d<num>::rotate_z(const double a) const
00664 {
00665   vector3d<num> q;
00666   double s,c;
00667 
00668   s = sin(a);
00669   c = cos(a);
00670 
00671   q.x = c*x + -s*y;
00672   q.y = s*x + c*y;
00673   q.z = z;
00674 
00675   return(q);
00676 }
00677 
00678 VECTOR_TEM double shortest_angle(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b) 
00679 {
00680   return(acos(std::max(-1.0,std::min(1.0,dot(a,b)/(a.length()*b.length())))));
00681 }
00682 
00683 VECTOR_TEM vector3d<num> shortest_axis(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b) 
00684 {
00685   return(cross(a,b).norm());
00686 }
00687 
00688 
00689 // set the vector to the minimum of its components and p's components
00690 VECTOR_TEM void vector3d<num>::take_min(const vector3d<num> p)
00691 {
00692   if(p.x < x) x = p.x;
00693   if(p.y < y) y = p.y;
00694   if(p.z < z) z = p.z;
00695 }
00696 
00697 // set the vector to the maximum of its components and p's components
00698 VECTOR_TEM void vector3d<num>::take_max(const vector3d<num> p)
00699 {
00700   if(p.x > x) x = p.x;
00701   if(p.y > y) y = p.y;
00702   if(p.z > z) z = p.z;
00703 }
00704 
00705 // returns distance between two points
00706 VECTOR_TEM num dist(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00707 {
00708   num dx,dy,dz;
00709 
00710   dx = a.x - b.x;
00711   dy = a.y - b.y;
00712   dz = a.z - b.z;
00713 
00714   return(mysqrt<num>(dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz));
00715 }
00716 
00717 VECTOR_TEM num distance(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00718 {
00719   return(dist(a,b));
00720 }
00721 
00722 // returns square of distance between two points
00723 VECTOR_TEM num sqdist(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00724 {
00725   num dx,dy,dz;
00726 
00727   dx = a.x - b.x;
00728   dy = a.y - b.y;
00729   dz = a.z - b.z;
00730 
00731   return(dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz);
00732 }
00733 
00734 VECTOR_TEM num sqdistance(const vector3d<num> a,const vector3d<num> b)
00735 {
00736   return(sqdist(a,b));
00737 }
00738 
00739 // returns distance from point p to line x0-x1
00740 VECTOR_TEM num distance_to_line(const vector3d<num> x0,const vector3d<num> x1,const vector3d<num> p)
00741 {
00742   // FIXME: this is probably broken
00743   vector3d<num> x;
00744   num t;
00745 
00746   t = ((p.x - x0.x) + (p.y - x0.y) + (p.z - x0.z)) / (x1.x + x1.y + x1.z);
00747   x = x0 + (x1 - x0) * t;
00748 
00749   return(distance(x,p));
00750 }

00757 template <class num>
00758 class vector2d{
00759 public:
00760   num x,y;
00761 
00762   vector2d()
00763     {}
00764   vector2d(num nx,num ny)
00765     {x=nx; y=ny;}
00766 
00768   void set(num nx,num ny)
00769     {x=nx; y=ny;}
00771   void setAll(num nx)
00772     {x=y=nx;}
00774   template <class vec> void set(vec p)
00775     {x=p.x; y=p.y;}
00777   void zero()
00778     {x=y=0;}
00779 
00781   vector2d<num> &operator=(vector2d<num> p)
00782     {set(p); return(*this);}
00783 
00785   template <class vec> vector2d<num> &operator=(vec p)
00786     {set(p.x,p.y); return(*this);}
00787     
00789   num &operator[](int idx)
00790     {return(((num*)this)[idx]);}
00791   const num &operator[](int idx) const
00792     {return(((num*)this)[idx]);}
00793

00797   num sqlength() const MustUseResult;
00799   num angle() const MustUseResult
00800     {return(atan2(y,x));}
00802   void heading(num angle)
00803     {x=cos(angle); y=sin(angle);}

00826     {return(vector2d(-y, x));}

00881 
00882 VECTOR_TEM num vector2d<num>::length() const
00883 {
00884   return(mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y));
00885 }
00886 
00887 VECTOR_TEM num vector2d<num>::sqlength() const
00888 {
00889   return(x*x + y*y);
00890 }
00891 
00892 VECTOR_TEM vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::norm() const
00893 {
00894   vector2d<num> p;
00895   num l;
00896 
00897   l = mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y);
00898   p.x = x / l;
00899   p.y = y / l;
00900 
00901   return(p);
00902 }
00903 
00904 VECTOR_TEM vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::norm(const num len) const
00905 {
00906   vector2d<num> p;
00907   num f;
00908 
00909   f = len / mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y);
00910   p.x = x * f;
00911   p.y = y * f;
00912 
00913   return(p);
00914 }
00915 
00916 VECTOR_TEM void vector2d<num>::normalize()
00917 {
00918   num l;
00919 
00920   l = mysqrt<num>(x*x + y*y);
00921   x /= l;
00922   y /= l;
00923 }
00924 
00925 VECTOR_TEM vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::bound(const num max_length) const
00926 {
00927   vector2d<num> p;
00928   num lsq,f;
00929 
00930   lsq = x*x + y*y;
00931 
00932   if(lsq < sq(max_length)){
00933     p.set(x,y);
00934   }else{
00935     f = max_length / mysqrt<num>(lsq);
00936     p.set(f*x,f*y);
00937   }
00938 
00939   return(p);
00940 }
00941 
00942 template <class num> template <class vec> num vector2d<num>::dot(const vec p) const
00943 {
00944   return(x*p.x + y*p.y);
00945 }
00946 
00947 VECTOR_TEM num vector2d<num>::perpdot(const vector2d<num> p) const
00948 // perp product, equivalent to (this->perp()).dot(p)
00949 {
00950   return(x*p.y - y*p.x);
00951 }
00952 
00953 VECTOR_TEM num dot(const vector2d<num> a,const vector2d<num> b)
00954 {
00955   return(a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y);
00956 }
00957 
00958 VECTOR_TEM num cosine(const vector2d<num> a,const vector2d<num> b)
00959 // equivalent to dot(a.norm(),b.norm())
00960 {
00961   num l;
00962 
00963   l = mysqrt<num>(a.x*a.x + a.y*a.y) * mysqrt<num>(b.x*b.x + b.y*b.y);
00964 
00965   return((a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y) / l);
00966 }
00967 
00968 VECTOR_TEM num vector2d<num>::cross(const vector2d<num> p) const
00969 {
00970   // right handed
00971   return(x*p.y - p.x*y);
00972 }
00973 
00974 // returns point rotated by <a> radians
00975 VECTOR_TEM vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::rotate(const double a) const
00976 {
00977   vector2d<num> q;
00978   double s,c;
00979 
00980   s = sin(a);
00981   c = cos(a);
00982 
00983   q.x = c*x + -s*y;
00984   q.y = s*x + c*y;
00985 
00986   return(q);
00987 }
00988 
00989 /* Depricated: replace "p.project(basis)" with "basis.project_out(p)"
00992 template <class num>
00993 vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::project(const vector2d<num> p) const
00994 {
00995   vector2d<num> q;
00996 
00997   q.x = p.x*x - p.y*y;
00998   q.y = p.y*x + p.x*y;
00999 
01000   return(q);
01001 }
01002 */
01003 
01006 template <class num>
01007 vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::project_in(const vector2d<num> p) const
01008 {
01009   vector2d<num> q;
01010   q.x = x*p.x + y*p.y; // q.x = this->dot(p);
01011   q.y = x*p.y - y*p.x; // q.y = this->perpdot(p);
01012   return(q);
01013 }
01014 
01017 template <class num>
01018 vector2d<num> vector2d<num>::project_out(const vector2d<num> p) const
01019 {
01020   vector2d<num> q;
01021   q.x = x*p.x - y*p.y;
01022   q.y = y*p.x + x*p.y;
01023   return(q);
01024 }
01025 
01026 #define VECTOR2D_EQUAL_BINARY_OPERATOR(opr) \
01027   template <class num> \
01028   vector2d<num> &vector2d<num>::operator opr (const vector2d<num> p) \
01029   {                  \
01030     x opr p.x;   \
01031     y opr p.y;   \
01032     return(*this);   \
01033   }

01081   template <class num> \
01082   bool vector2d<num>::operator opr (const vector2d<num> p) const \
01083   {                            \
01084     return((x opr p.x) combine \
01085            (y opr p.y));       \
01086   }

01099 {

01167 VECTOR_TEM num dist(const vector2d<num> a,const vector2d<num> b)
01168 {

01184 {
